questions.question: If you change the StatisticsCalculator Attributes to Analyze to VisitorCount instead of ParkArea, which neighborhood has the highest average park visitor count?
Why would it be inappropriate to use the Cumulative output port to assess if the Group By worked?
options: Inspecting the Cumulative port results in an error in the Translation Log.
AverageParkArea in the Cumulative port is updated for each feature processed, meaning that only the last feature processed in each neighborhood will actually be correct.
The Cumulative port is not compatible with the Process at End (Blocking) Group By mode.
The Cumulative port is not affected by Group By.
